title: Client Network Problem?
body: Trying to get into a ranked game and everything is working fine until i get to the loading screen. As soon as i hit 80% a network warning poped up saying "You have disconnected, Please check your interent connection and try again". But everything is working fine my internet is at is prime and have no other issue?

replies.body: I had the same issue and found out that my net was having problems authenticating a connection, if you're still encountering this issue I'd give your ISP (Internet Service Provider) a call and they will guide you to a fix
tell us what fix you got no one has time to call their isp

Google IP address (if you don't know it)
Type your ip into google
You will be sent to your router settings
Log in
Unless changed user and pass would both be admin
Uninstall the server
Reboot router
Delete user and pass
Leave everything blank then save
Set router up as new device

Pretty much just a hard reset (factory reset) so the internet can re authenticate

I hope this works for you, best of luck!
